There was once nothing beneath those skillfully painted smiles, until,

Until the vortex breaks as it meets the firey uncrowned lord, torn asunder as the walls vaporise into thin air.

Slowly, slowly, the encased cold +

+ Diluc does not even need to coax his words in honey, his lips unsullied with sweet nothings, as he enter the clan heir clad in solitude.

The silver locked Kamisato Ayato, head of house Kamisato, his smiles as cold as winter--the emptiness in his eyes as he don masks after +
